text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Average daily minimum air<n>temperature—minus two degrees.<n>
Average monthly sunshine<n>hours—forty.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
As indicated by the data, December in<n>Germany is dark and
cold.<n>Simultaneously, it is a period when<n>lights of 2,700
degrees Kelvin<n>illuminate the night.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The holiday season is one of the<n>most important times of
year for many<n>Germans, and is one of the busiest<n>for my
parents' cake shop.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
My father would skip sleep to<n>prepare. I remember those
bloodshot<n>eyes measuring every cup of sugar<n>to the
gram, the love and labor that<n>went into the mix.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: ...A gram over. This requires a slightreduction.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
To my young mind, his excessive<n>devotion must have
seemed<n>concerning. I asked him a question<n>which I now
realize had been utterly<n>misguided.

text_block_list.name: Young Flash
text_block_list.text: Papa, why do you have to be soexact? A small mistake won't makeyour cakes any less yummy.

text_block_list.name: Flash's Father
text_block_list.text: Flash, listen carefully. An error ofeven just one gram...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...can throw everything off.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day out on the track, as I'm<n>watching the students train,
a flash of<n>black catches my eye.
One minute, fifty-eight point one<n>seconds. Goal achieved.

At 11:45, a five-minute break—I'm<n>right on schedule. After
that...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's been at it for a while—running<n>laps, checking her time,
then taking a<n>break. Must be following a set<n>schedule.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Woah, look at her... That's Eishin<n>Flash, right? Isn't she
from Germany?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it's been about a year since<n>she came here, I think?
Not that I've<n>ever talked to her...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Shoot, did she hear us? L-let's go<n>somewhere else.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With her stoic bearing and German<n>heritage—a rarity even
among<n>Tracen's large foreign exchange<n>crowd—it's no
wonder the other<n>students are curious about her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She herself, on the other hand, is<n>either oblivious to the
attention or<n>simply doesn't care.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Time to start again.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Hah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her neatly trimmed hair and tail<n>shimmer in the sunlight,
jet-black<n>strands undulating as she runs—I find<n>myself
drawn in by the beauty of it all.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Later, I spot Eishin Flash again<n>elsewhere, talking with—or
more like<n>trapped with—a much more energetic<n>student.

Hey, Flash, hey! A small favor to<n>ask—super small! Come
watch me<n>perform real quick, 'kay? ♪

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: "Real quick." How many minutes is<n>that?
Huh?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon, please be precise with<n>your language.
Approximately how<n>many minutes and seconds is this<n>
performance scheduled to last?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
C'mon! What is this, elementary<n>school? Don't be a
meanie!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That was not my intention. I've<n>simply set a schedule for
myself<n>down to the second and don't have<n>much time to
spare.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah! There you go again with yourschedule! You can be just a littlelate, right?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, I cannot permit myself to be off<n>my schedule by even a
second. That<n>would not be following things<n>properly.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I have constructed a schedule that<n>accounts for everything I
do down to<n>the second, including transit. I made it<n>to be the
perfect schedule for my<n>improvement.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
So long as I stick to it, I'll be able to<n>achieve the proper
results at tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I get that this upcoming race<n>is a super big deal for
you, but still...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: A big deal? No, it's simply what I<n>must do.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Umm... You're not pushing yourself<n>too hard, right?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Yes, no problems here. Everything is<n>proceeding without
hindrance.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Now, if you'll excuse me, it's already<n>five minutes and
fifty-five seconds<n>past my allotted transit time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Please inform me of your next<n>performance beforehand. I'll
slot it<n>into my post-tryouts schedule.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah—Flash!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
An expressionless Eishin Flash runs<n>off before Falcon can
stop her. She's<n>very strict about time, that's for sure.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Sigh. Well, there she goes. Nowthen... You there—I saw youwatching! You're coming with me. ☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I could feel your passionate gaze<n>from a mile away. ♪
C'mon, you get to<n>see my concert. ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even as I'm being dragged off to<n>places unknown,
thoughts of Eishin<n>Flash run through my mind and I<n>decide
to check out her tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I wonder what her training will be like<n>leading up to the day
of...
